languages.text: {n}Маршал смотрит прямо на вас, и в его взгляде сквозит странная пустота.{/n} "Вот как. Не только Вольный Торговец оказал{mf|ся|ась} преступником, но и Вультур. Однако больше всех виновен в произошедшем я — поддался на манипуляции одной еретички и не смог остановить друг{mf|ого|ую} нарушител{mf|я|ьцу} Лекс Империалис. Вольный Торговец, если у вас еще осталась хоть капля чести — казните меня, и пусть Император осудит мою душу".

{n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал смотрит прямо на вас, и в его взгляде сквозит странная пустота.{/n} "Вот как. Не только Вольный Торговец оказал{mf|ся|ась} преступником, но и Вультур. Однако больше всех виновен в произошедшем я — поддался на манипуляции одной еретички и не смог остановить друг{mf|ого|ую} нарушител{mf|я|ьцу} Лекс Империалис. Вольный Торговец, если у вас еще осталась хоть капля чести — казните меня, и пусть Император осудит мою душу".

However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

{n}There is a strange emptiness in the Marshal's gaze as he looks at you.{/n} "I see. Not only did the Rogue Trader turn out to be a criminal, but Vultur did too. However, the greatest blame lies with me — I succumbed to one heretic's manipulation and failed to stop another from violating the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if there is still a shred of honour left in you, you will execute me — and may the Emperor judge my soul."

Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

The greatest blame, however, lies with me — I succumbed to one heretic's manipulation and failed to stop another from violating the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if is any shred of honour still left in you, you will execute me — and may the Emperor judge my soul."

However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall sieht dich direkt an, und sein Blick ist seltsam leer.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Nicht nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entpuppt sich als kriminell, sondern auch Vultur. Dennoch trifft mich die größte Schuld für die Vorfälle, weil ich den Manipulationen eines Ketzers erlegen bin und gleichzeitig versäumt habe, einen anderen Gesetzesbrecher des Lex Imperia aufzuhalten. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wenn noch ein Funken Ehre in Euch ist, dann lasst mich hinrichten. Möge der Imperator das Urteil über meine Seele fällen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall sieht dich direkt an, und sein Blick ist seltsam leer.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Nicht nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} entpuppt sich als kriminell, sondern auch Vultur. Dennoch trifft mich die größte Schuld für die Vorfälle, weil ich den Manipulationen eines Ketzers erlegen bin und gleichzeitig versäumt habe, einen anderen Gesetzesbrecher des Lex Imperia aufzuhalten. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, wenn noch ein Funken Ehre in Euch ist, dann lasst mich hinrichten. Möge der Imperator das Urteil über meine Seele fällen."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal vous fixe étrangement d'un regard vide.{/n} « Je vois. Il s'avère que Vultur est une criminelle au même titre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Toutefois, je suis responsable. Je me suis laissé manipuler et je n'ai pas réussi à empêcher quelqu'un d'enfreindre la Lex Imperialis. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, s'il vous reste une once d'honneur, faites-moi exécuter et l'Empereur jugera mon âme. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal vous fixe étrangement d'un regard vide.{/n} « Je vois. Il s'avère que Vultur est une criminelle au même titre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Toutefois, je suis responsable. Je me suis laissé manipuler et je n'ai pas réussi à empêcher quelqu'un d'enfreindre la Lex Imperialis. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, s'il vous reste une once d'honneur, faites-moi exécuter et l'Empereur jugera mon âme. »

languages.text: {n}元帅直勾勾地盯着你，目光中带着某种古怪的空洞感。{/n}“我现在看清了，原来犯罪分子不止行商浪人一个，就连沃尔图尔也犯了罪。然而，我才是真正的罪魁祸首。我不仅听从异端分子的操纵，还没能阻止另一个异端分子违背帝国律法。行商浪人，如果你心里还有一丝荣誉感的话，就赶紧把我处决吧。愿帝皇审判我的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅直勾勾地盯着你，目光中带着某种古怪的空洞感。{/n}“我现在看清了，原来犯罪分子不止行商浪人一个，就连沃尔图尔也犯了罪。然而，我才是真正的罪魁祸首。我不仅听从异端分子的操纵，还没能阻止另一个异端分子违背帝国律法。行商浪人，如果你心里还有一丝荣誉感的话，就赶紧把我处决吧。愿帝皇审判我的灵魂。”

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal te mira a los ojos, pero su mirada está extrañamente ausente.{/n} «Ya veo. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha resultado ser un{mf||a} criminal, y Vultur otra. Sin embargo, la mayor parte de la culpa es mía, ya que me he dejado manipular por una hereje y no he podido evitar que otr{mf|o|a} infrinja la Lex Imperialis. Comerciante Independiente, si le queda algo de honor, haga que me ejecuten y deje que el Emperador juzgue mi alma».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal te mira a los ojos, pero su mirada está extrañamente ausente.{/n} «Ya veo. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha resultado ser un{mf||a} criminal, y Vultur otra. Sin embargo, la mayor parte de la culpa es mía, ya que me he dejado manipular por una hereje y no he podido evitar que otr{mf|o|a} infrinja la Lex Imperialis. Comerciante Independiente, si le queda algo de honor, haga que me ejecuten y deje que el Emperador juzgue mi alma».

languages.text: {n}将帥はあなたをまっすぐに見つめた。その目には奇妙な虚ろさが宿っている。{/n}「なるほど。ローグトレーダーが犯罪者であっただけでなく、ヴァルターもそうであったのですね。しかし、最も責めを負うべきなのは私です。異端者に惑わされ、もう一人の『レックス・インペリア』の違反者を止めることができませんでしたから。ローグトレーダー、もしわずかでも名誉が残っているのなら、私を処刑してください。皇帝陛下が私の魂を裁かれんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥はあなたをまっすぐに見つめた。その目には奇妙な虚ろさが宿っている。{/n}「なるほど。ローグトレーダーが犯罪者であっただけでなく、ヴァルターもそうであったのですね。しかし、最も責めを負うべきなのは私です。異端者に惑わされ、もう一人の『レックス・インペリア』の違反者を止めることができませんでしたから。ローグトレーダー、もしわずかでも名誉が残っているのなら、私を処刑してください。皇帝陛下が私の魂を裁かれんことを」

languages.text: {n}Mareşal, gözlerinde garip bir boşlukla doğrudan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Sadece Hür Tacir'in değil, Vultur'un da suçlu olduğu ortaya çıktı. Ancak yaşananlardan en çok ben sorumluyum. Bir kâfirin oyunlarına kandım, diğer bir Lex İmperialis ihlalcisini ise durduramadım. Hür Tacir, içinde zerre kadar onur kaldıysa beni idam ettir. İmparator ruhumu yargılasın."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks directly at you, with a strange emptiness in his eyes.{/n} "I see. Not only has the Rogue Trader turned out to be a criminal, but Vultur as well. However, I am the one most to blame for what happened, having been swayed by the manipulations of one heretic while failing to stop another violator of the Lex Imperialis. Rogue Trader, if you have a shred of honour left, have me executed, and may the Emperor judge my soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mareşal, gözlerinde garip bir boşlukla doğrudan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Sadece Hür Tacir'in değil, Vultur'un da suçlu olduğu ortaya çıktı. Ancak yaşananlardan en çok ben sorumluyum. Bir kâfirin oyunlarına kandım, diğer bir Lex İmperialis ihlalcisini ise durduramadım. Hür Tacir, içinde zerre kadar onur kaldıysa beni idam ettir. İmparator ruhumu yargılasın."

{n}Miralay'ın bakışları garip bir boşluk hissiyatı uyandırıyor.{/n} Anlıyorum. Yalnızca Hür Tacir değil, Vultur da bir suçluymuş. Ancak en büyük suç şahsıma ait. Bir sapkının yalanlarına yenik düştüm. Diğerinin de Lex İmperialis'i çiğnemesine mâni olamadım. Hür Tacir, eğer zerre kadar şerefiniz varsa beni infaz edersiniz. Ruhumun yargısı, İmparator'a aittir."
